name: Grutas de San Cristobal
description:
Introduction

Tourist cave that also allows wild cave tours for experienced people that get there early. The cave is quite extensive and they say it's well worth the visit.

Approach

Descent

Recent information says the caves are 10.2Km long and 550m deep, but the cave maps may cover less than that.

  • http://www.amcs-pubs.org/maps/2583.pdf Old map (only 3km and 330m deep)
  • http://www.amcs-pubs.org/maps/3146.pdf Most recent map (505m deep)

Exit

Red tape

Beta sites
